name: Last Lap Heroes
description:
Your engines have already been started!
With a few short clicks you will find yourself in control of a race car, not at the start of the race, but at the final laps. With cunning plans and razor sharp instincts steer yourself to the front, determined to become the last lap hero!

Graphics From Your Childhood
We bring you the graphics of your childhood, yes literal childhood as we populate the track surroundings with art from children or those who wish to unleash their inner childhood. Send in pictures to our support email address and you might find your art in the game!

Tactical Turn Based Racing
Find yourself online opponents from all around the globe, and match your plan to beat theirs. Choose your gear carefully, do you play it safe with a lower one or risk spinning out with the biggest gear possible.

Safe Online Environment
We strive to bring you a safe way to play, through the help of Steam datagram relay and a curated set of chat commands.

Bring Your Friends (or Don't)
Invite up to four (un)friendly rivals and compete for supremacy in matchmade games.

When All the Lights Turn Red
Wishlist our game and be the first on track!
